QuestData.Title: No-Landing Zone
QuestData.Description:
These pirates are ruthless - they're bringing in landing boats to cut off our escape!
The guards are down at the riverside holding them off, but I'm afraid they'll be overrun before my family and I can get away!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Burnsy the Blade, Wiley Jaki, and Skullcrusher Cotner.
QuestData.CompletionText: Please help the guards fend off those pirates!
QuestData.RewardText: Oh thank you, thank you so much!
